descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
A Once-in-a-Lifetime School Experience for You

"SchoolFriendMemories Vol.2" is a romance adventure game where you can experience the youthful days of high school, centering around everyday conversations with Akari Akesaka, a senior aiming for art school.

As the protagonist, you will relive the process of deepening your bond with the heroine through various school scenarios—engaging in casual daily chats, sometimes filled with humor.
[media]


Enjoy an irreplaceable romance in a VR space that brings the school atmosphere to life, from the art club room to the hallways and the infirmary.   
Experience those seemingly ordinary yet precious moments of youth once again.
[media]
[media]

Additionally, this game features a quiz section based on four main categories: Academics, Sports, Entertainment, and Music & Arts. The abilities you enhance through these quizzes will bring slight variations to the ending.

[media]

Finally
This title includes an auto-save system that records your progress automatically.  
 However, please note that there is no option to reset your data.

Just like your real-life youth was a once-in-a-lifetime experience, the youth you live through in this game is also unique and fleeting.   
Cherish each moment and enjoy the present to the fullest.
